channel.title: NICE ADMINISTRATION BRO v2
channel.description:
because some fascist mod deleted my topic, NICE ADMINISTRATION BRO V2
and in case you tards are too lazy to login to the server, the spawn server is wrecked, several plugins don't work etc

item.title: NICE ADMINISTRATION BRO v2
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“Niall, post:1, topic:388773”]because some fascist mod deleted my topic, NICE ADMINISTRATION BRO V2

and in case you tards are too lazy to login to the server, the spawn server is wrecked, several plugins don’t work etc[/quote]
Someones cranky, you do realize that we don’t have a team of people like other gaming company’s have working full time on this right? Have some consideration for the people working on the problem to give you guys a game to play.

Read full topic

item.title: NICE ADMINISTRATION BRO v2
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

reyx7:

I won’t kill you in the city limits. When I kill you, it’s going to be a fair kill. I have an underground bunker built out of furnaces if you don’t trust the others though.

im also building a huge one in my basement just to pass the time but atm server is shit so yea

item.title: NICE ADMINISTRATION BRO v2
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:27, topic:388773”][quote author=LilXCj link=topic=484595.msg3551106#msg3551106 date=1301530071]
To be honest, I’m annoyed at the lack of creativity you guys possess. You guys are going to be sad because your work is going to be gone but honestly, take a look at the world map. Cluttered with trolling designs, most of the map is 1.1 and some sections are 1.3. Starting over just doesn’t seem as bad as it seems, especially with all these new players here (that don’t even use our forums).
[/quote]

Me and Noob have had some creative cities. You just never visit -.-[/quote]

Due to PVP. The lack of safety places me into a paranoia that I just won’t visit other cities. It is the main reason why I create cities.

Read full topic
